title: Any Excuse
description: In this follow-up to "Only Words," author Acer Adamson gives us another glimpse at the complicated lives of Detective Maxwell Fielding and his beautiful cross-dressing lover, Skyler Trent.The police department is honoring Max for performing above and beyond the call of duty, and Max has asked Skyler to accompany him to the awards banquetâ€”a huge step for both of them. Nervous about how the unconventional manner in which Skyler dresses will be received by a hotel ballroom full of cops, the press, and the city's highest elected officials, Max is in for a bigger surprise than he bargained for, and Skyler doesn't disappoint.
author: Acer Adamson
